RECEIVED_MALFORMED_RESPONSE: Received malformed response. Check that the server URL is correct. More details can be found in the developer console of the browser.
OPERATION_IN_PROGRESS_PLEASE_WAIT: An operation is in progress, please wait and don't interrupt the process, don't close the browser nor reload the site.
PROVIDED_DOMAIN_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_REGISTRA: The provided domain in your username is not allowed for the registration on this server.
PERMISSIONS_TO_ACCESS_THIS_ENTRY_HAVE_BE: The permission to access this entry has been denied.
CONFIGURE_MULTIPLE_ACCOUNTS_WITH_GRANT_P: Configure multiple accounts with admin privilege to be able to modify the permissions of the share in the case of a lost admin password or resigned administrator.
DECRYPTION_OF_EXPORT_FAILED_WRONG_PASSWO: The decryption of the export failed. You most likely provided a wrong password.
ENTER_PASSWORD_IF_YOUR_EXPORT_IS_ENCRYPT: Enter the password that was used to encrypt your export. Leave the input field empty, if your export is not encrypted.
ENTER_PASSWORD_TO_ENCRYPT_YOUR_EXPORT: Enter a password to encrypt your export. If you don't enter a password the export won't be encrypted.
INCLUDE_TRASH_BIN_ENTRIES: Include entries of the trash bin
TOGGLE_OWN_GROUP_ADMIN_WARNING: You are about to revoke your own group admin permission for this group. Make sure that someone else has group admin before revoking your own. Are you sure that you want to continue?
NEW_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_CODE_WARNING: You are about to generate a new recovery code. The new recovery recode will replace earlier codes, so old codes won't work anymore. Are you sure?
TOGGLE_OWN_GRANT_RIGHT_WARNING: You are about to revoke your own permission to change the permissions of users for this share. Make sure that someone else has grant rights before revoking your own. Are you sure that you want to continue?
DELETE_OWN_SHARE_RIGHT_WARNING: You are about to delete your own share right. You will lose all rights to this share. Are you sure?
MAINTENANCE_MODE_ACTIVE: Server under maintenance and temporary not available.
UNKNOWN_ERROR_CHECK_BROWSER_CONSOLE: Unknown error. Please check your browser's console for details.
USER_DOES_NOT_EXIST_PROBABLY_DELETED: User does not exist on the server and has probably been deleted. You can delete the user from your trusted users datastore and try again. Username: {{name}}
EMAIL_DOMAIN_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_REGISTER: E-Mail domain not allowed for registration.
ACTIVATION_CODE_INCORRECT: Activation code incorrect or account already activated.
SERVER_NOT_SUPPORT_DUO: The server does not support Duo 2-Factor.
SERVER_NOT_SUPPORT_GA: The server does not support TOTP.
SERVER_NOT_SUPPORT_YUBIKEY: The server does not support Yubikeys
AUTOFILL_SERVICE_ACTIVATE_NOW_INFO: In order to use the full feature set of the app you should activate Psono's autofill service. You can do so by pushing the button below or skip this step.
USER_DISABLED_ASK_ADMIN_TO_ENABLE: User has been disabled. Contact an administrator to activate it.
USER_WITH_EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: User with the specified email address already exists.
USER_WITH_USERNAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: User with the specified username already exists.
PASSWORD_INCORRECT_SERVER_DECLINED_SECUR: The provided password was incorrect. The server therefore declined the security report. Please try again.
SECURITY_REPORT_REQUIRED: Your administrator requires you to create a new security report before you can access your datastore again. Please create a new one.
SECURITY_REPORT_SOON_REQUIRED: Your administrator requires you soon to create a new security report. You can create one now preemptive.
GROUP_NAME_TOO_SHORT: The name of the group is too short.
NO_PUBLIC_KEY_FOUND_FOR_EMAIL: No public key found for this email.
PUBLIC_KEY_MISSING_TAGS: Public key does not contain either the starting or finishing tag.
PRIVATE_KEY_MISSING_TAGS: Private key does not contain either the starting or finishing tag.
PRIVATE_KEY_CONTAINS_MULTIPLE_KEYS: Sorry, but your private key contains more than one private key.
PUBLIC_KEY_CONTAINS_MULTIPLE_KEYS: Sorry, but your public key contains more than one public key.
AT_LEAST_ONE_CODE_INCORRECT: At least one of your codes is wrong
SERVER_OFFLINE_DETAILS: There was a connection problem. Check your internet / network connection and the server's address. Server offline.
HANDSHAKE_ERROR_DETAILS: Unable to establish a secure connection to the server. Error in SSL certificate verification.
EITHER_SECRET_OR_FILE_REQUIRED_NOT_BOTH: Either secret or file required, not both
VALID_TILL_CANNOT_BE_IN_THE_PAST: 'Valid till' cannot be in the past.
INFO_PUBLIC_TITLE_WILL_BE_VISIBLE: The public title will be shown e.g. before the user enters the passphrase
PASSPHRASE_MISSMATCH: Passphrase and repetition do not match.
SHARE_LINK_PASSPHRASE_INFO: Enter a passphrase to protect the link secret. Leave empty for no protection.
INFO_HOW_LONG_CAN_LINK_SHARE_BE_USED: How long can this link be used. Leave empty for no restriction.
INFO_HOW_OFTEN_CAN_LINK_SHARE_BE_USED: How often can this link be used. Leave empty for no restriction.
USERNAME_OR_PASSWORD_WRONG: Login declined. Maybe wrong username or password.
ACCOUNT_DELETION_DISABLED: Useraccounts cannot be deleted on this server
USERNAME_VALIDATION_NAME_CONTAINS_INVALI: Usernames may only contain letters, numbers, periods and dashes
DELETE_GROUP_WARNING: You are about to delete the group. All shares will be lost / become inaccessible. Are you sure?
USER_NOT_PART_OF_REQUIRED_GROUP: Your account is not part of one of the authorized groups.
LOGIN_INFO_CANNOT_BE_DECRYPTED: Login information could not be decrypted by the server.
SAML_TOKEN_NOT_FOUND_ALREADY_USED_OR_EXP: SAML token not found, already used or expired.
PASSWORD_RESET_HAS_BEEN_DISABLED: The password reset functionality has been disabled.
REGISTRATION_FAILED_USERNAME_AND_EMAIL_H: Registration failed. Username and email have to match.
REGISTRATION_EMAIL_DELIVERY_FAILED: Registration email delivery failed. Account not created.
BEFORE_ACTIVATION_LOGOUT: You are currently logged in. Before activating another account please logout.
INFO_NO_READ_RIGHTS_FOR_FILE_REPOSITORY_: You do not have the necessary permissions to view the configuration of this data repository.
INFO_NO_GRANT_RIGHTS_FOR_FILE_REPOSITORY: You do not have the necessary permissions to edit other users rights.
USER_HAS_ALREADY_RIGHTS_FOR_FILE_REPOSIT: The user has already other rights for this file repository
SELECT_EITHER_SHARD_OR_REPOSITORY: You have to select either a file repository or shard as target (not both)
DELETE_FILE_REPOSITORY_WARNING: You are about to delete this data repository. All data that has been uploaded there will be lost. This action is irreversible. Are you sure?
DELETE_FILE_REPOSITORY_RIGHT_WARNING: You are about to delete the rights to this data repository. You will lose the capability to upload files to this repository. This action is irreversible. Are you sure?
FILE_REPOSITORIES_HAVE_BEEN_DISABLED: The server administrator has disabled file repositories. Please talk to your administrator.
HERE_YOU_CAN_MANAGE_ALL_YOUR_FILE_REPOSI: Here you can manage all your file repositories
CHUNK_NOT_AVAILABLE: Chunk not available. Please try again later.
NO_PERMISSION_OR_NOT_EXIST: No permission or it does not exist.
INSUFFICIENT_FUNDS_WITH_CREDIT_BUY_ADDRE: Insufficient funds, you can buy some here:
API_KEY_DETAIL_EXPLANATION: Here are all the parameters of the API key.
DELETE_ENTRY_WARNING: You are about to delete this entry. If this entry is a share and you'd like it to be removed for others as well, remove share rights first before removing this entry. Are you sure?
DELETE_ENTRY_PERMANENT_WARNING: You are about to permanently delete this entry. This action cannot be reversed. Are you sure?
DELETE_FOLDER_WARNING: You are about to delete the folder and all its content. If this folder is a share or contains shares and you'd like them to be removed for others as well, remove share rights first before removing this folder. Are you sure?
DELETE_FOLDER_PERMANENT_WARNING: You are about to delete the folder and all its content. This action cannot be reversed. Are you sure?
DELETE_API_KEY_WARNING: You are about to delete an API key. All people and applications using this API key will lose access. Are you sure?
LEAVE_GROUP_WARNING: You are about to leave the group. You will lose access to shares that belong to the group. Are you sure?
API_KEY_INSECURE_USAGE_WARNING: You are about to allow this key to use insecure methods. With this, it's possible to access secrets without the complexity of the additional transport encryption or the need to decrypt passwords locally. You should only allow this if you cannot use the official console client and have to use simpler clients (e.g. curl).
API_KEY_NOT_RESTRICTED_TO_SECRETS_WARNIN: You removed the restriction for specific secrets. As a consequence this API key will have complete access to your account.
RIGHT_TO_READ: Right to read (allows all GET operations)
RIGHT_TO_WRITE: Right to write (allows all PUT, POST and DELETE operations)
HERE_YOU_CAN_MANAGE_ALL_YOUR_API_KEYS: Here you can manage all your API keys
API_KEYS_HAVE_BEEN_DISABLED: The server administrator has disabled api keys. Please talk to your administrator.
EXPORT_HAS_BEEN_DISABLED: The server administrator has disabled the export feature. Please talk to your administrator.
EMERGENCY_CODE_ACTIVATED: Emergency code activation countdown started. You can login once the countdown is finished. Please repeat this step in:
EMERGENCY_CODE_WAITING: The emergency code activation countdown has already been started. You can login once the countdown is finished. Please repeat this step in:
WARNING_OF_EMERGENCY_CODE: Everybody with this information can access your passwords. Please, give this information only to trustworthy people and ask them to store this information securely.
INFO_FOR_EMERGENCY_CODE: Hi, with the information below you can access my password safe if something happens to me. Please put this information somewhere safe.
SEND_THIS_EMERGENCY_INFORMATION_INFO: Send the information below to the person that you trust.
LEAD_TIME_IN_HOURS_PLACEHOLDER: Time till this this code will grant access to your passwords.
PERSON_YOU_GIVE_THIS_CODE_TO_EG_SISTER: Person you give this code to, e.g. sister
EMERGENCY_CODES_DESCRIPTION: Emergency Codes allows other trustworthy people (e.g. your parents or wife) to login on your behalf if something happens to you. In contrast to recovery codes the other person has to wait a bit before the code will grant access. Further you will be informed once someone activates such a code giving you the chance to prevent this action.
PSONO_WILL_STORE_THE_PASSWORD_ENCRYPTED: Psono will store the password encrypted
DO_YOU_WANT_TO_SAVE_THIS_PASSWORD: Do you want to save this password?
PICK_ONE_SERVER_BELOW_OR_ENTER_URL: Pick one of the servers below or enter the new url
CLIENT_STORES_SECRETS_IN_LOCAL_STORAGE: The client will store all secrets (passwords, notes, bookmarks, ...) in the local storage of the client. All of them will be encrypted with the passphrase that you provide. Files are not downloaded.
THE_CLIENT_IS_DOWNLOADING_ALL_CONTENT: The client is now downloading all necessary content from the server.
PASSWORD_CHANGE_LOGOUT_OTHER_DEVICES: You have changed your passwords. We advice you to logout all other devices!
IT_IS_IMPOSSIBLE_TO_REVERT_DELETE_DATAST: It is impossible to revert this action. Deleting a datastore is permanent. All content of the datastore will be lost!
USE_HKP_OR_PROVIDE_THE_PUBLIC_KEY_MANUAL: Use the HKP search function or provide the public key manually, including -----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK und -----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----
PLEASE_REMOVE_RECEIVERS_WITHOUT_PUBLIC_K: Please remove receivers that have no public key.
YOU_NEVER_CONFIRMED_THIS_USERS_IDENTITY: You never confirmed this user's identity. Please ask the user on a "secure" channel if that really is his or her public key. If you confirmed this public key and want to add it to your trusted user datastore click here:
ADMINISTRATOR_REQUIRES_SECOND_FACTOR: Your administrator requires that you setup a second factor. Please choose one and set it up.
ADMINISTRATOR_REQUIRES_SECOND_FACTOR_GO_: Your administrator requires that you setup a second factor. Please use the web interface of the website to configure one.
YOUR_TRUSTED_USER_LIST_IS_EMPTY: Your trusted users list is empty. Right click here to add a user to your trusted users list.
SCAN_THE_CODE_THEN_CLICK_HERE: Scan the code and then click here
WEBAUTHN_FIDO2_TOKEN_NOT_FOUND_FOR_THIS_: FIDO2 / WebAuthn token not found for this origin
URL_FILTER_EG: URL filter e.g. example.com or sub.example.com
SSH_KEY_GENERATION_EXPLAINED: The generator is using ed25519, an elliptic curve signing algorithm using EdDSA and Curve25519.
TITLE: Title
SYMBOL_IN_THE_TOP_RIGHT: symbol in the top right corner to start.
RIGHT_CLICK_HERE_TO_CREATE_ONE: Right click here to create one.
CLICK_ON_THE_SYMBOL_IN_THE_TOP_RIGHT_COR:
Click on the
<2>
symbol in the top right corner to start.
WE_GENERATE_YOUR_SSH_KEYS_PLEASE_WAIT: We are generating your SSH Keys now. This can take several minutes, depending on your hardware.
WE_GENERATE_YOUR_GPG_KEYS_PLEASE_WAIT: We are generating your GPG Keys now. This can take several minutes, depending on your hardware.
NAME_AND_EMAIL_ADDRESS_WILL_BE_PUBLICLY_: The name and email address will be publicly available. The email address cannot be "fake" if you want other people to be able to decrypt your emails. You can use any name, but it will be searchable.
YOUR_KEYS_PASSPHRASE: Your key's passphrase (if it's password protected)
SET_LONGER_OR_MORE_COMPLEX_PASSWORD: Set a longer password or more complex password
DO_NOT_USE_PASSWORDS_TWICE: Change password, do not use passwords twice.
PASSWORD_HAS_BEEN_COMPROMISED: Change password, it has been compromised.
PASSWORD_HAS_BEEN_COMPROMISED_MULTIPLE_T: Change password, it has been compromised {{ pwned }} times.
ANALYSIS_CAN_TAKE_SEVERAL_MINUTES: This analysis can take several minutes to complete.
SECURITY_REPORT_GOAL: Psono's goal is to increase your security awareness with this report. We will analyze all passwords for their strength and complexity, and give you tips how to improve security and which passwords you should change. In the process we will read all passwords and other information from the server and then decrypt and analyse them completely in your browser.
CONSIDER_ENABLING_MULTIFACTOR_AUTHENTICA: Please consider enabling multifactor authentication as it significantly improves your account's security.
CONSIDER_ENABLING_RECOVERY_CODES: Please consider creating a recovery code to recover your account in case of a lost passwords.
NAME: Name
EXPORT_DESCRIPTION: Export data for an offline backup or other purposes. The export contains all the passwords, usernames and URLs, ... excluding files which need to be manually downloaded.
IMPORT_DESCRIPTION: Import data from browsers or other password managers.
KNOWN_HOSTS_DESCRIPTION: Here you can manage the keys of all the servers you ever connected to.
SESSIONS_DESCRIPTION: A list of all potential active sessions and devices can be found below.
GPG_DESCRIPTION: Specify here your default GPG key.
DISABLE_BROWSER_PM: Automatic disabling of the browser's built-in password manager
CREDIT_CARD_NUMBER_COPY_NOTIFICATION: Credit card number copied to clipboard
CREDIT_CARD_NAME_COPY_NOTIFICATION: Name on credit card copied to clipboard
CREDIT_CARD_EXPIRATION_DATE_COPY_NOTIFIC: Credit card expiration date copied to clipboard
CREDIT_CARD_CVC_COPY_NOTIFICATION: Credit card CVC copied to clipboard
CREDIT_CARD_PIN_COPY_NOTIFICATION: Credit card PIN copied to clipboard
ENTRY_TYPES_DESCRIPTION: Adjust here the normally offered types for new entries. Types that are not selected will be hidden.
PASSWORD_GENERATOR_DESCRIPTION: Adjust here the settings for the password generator.
EARLIER_GENERATED_RECOVERY_CODES: Earlier generated recovery codes have been overwritten and will not work anymore!
SAVE_INFORMATION_TO_RECOVER: Please save this information to recover from a lost password.
TO_VERIFY_PUBLIC_KEY: To verify that this is the user you want to share data with, ask the user if this is really his or her public key.
OVERVIEW_DESCRIPTION: The overview of your account with details like your public key.
CHANGE_E_MAIL_DESCRIPTION: You can provide here a new e-mail address (together with your current password for verification).
CHANGE_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: You can provide here a new password (together with your current password for verification).
GENERATE_PASSWORD_RECOVERY_DESCRIPTION: You should create a password recovery code to recover your account with a lost password.
MULTIFACTOR_AUTHENTICATION_DESCRIPTION: A second factor is the best security improvement for your account.
DELETE_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: If you plan to delete your account you can do that here. Be aware all data will be lost.
YOU_ARE_ABOUT_TO_DELETE_YOUR_ACCOUNT: You are about to delete your account. This action cannot be undone. All data will be lost!
ENTER_YOUR_YUBIKEY_OTP_TOKEN: Please enter your YubiKey OTP Token
APPROVE_THE_PUSH_NOTIFICATION: Approve the push notification on your mobile or provide your Duo Code
THE_SIGNATURE_OF_THE_SERVER_CHANGED: The signature of the server changed. It could mean that the connection to the server has been compromised.
CONTACT_THE_OWNER_OF_THE_SERVER: Please contact the owner of this server.
IT_APPEARS_THAT_YOU_WANT_TO_CONNECT: It appears, that you want to connect to this server for the first time. Please verify that the fingerprint of the server is correct before approving.
HERE_YOU_CAN_MANAGE_ALL_YOUR_PASSWORD_DA: Here you can manage all your password datastores
DATASTORE_DESCRIPTION_MUST_BE_UNIQUE: The description of a datastore must be unique. The chosen description is already used by another datastore.
SERVER_ASKS_FOR_YOUR_PLAINTEXT_PASSWORD: Server asks for your plaintext password
PICK_SECOND_FACTOR: Pick one of the following second factor options
ACCEPTING_THIS_WILL_SEND_YOUR_PLAIN_PASS: Accepting this will send your plain password to the server and should only be allowed if you are using LDAP or similar authentication methods. You can decline this, but this might fail in an authentication failure.
OR_WORDLIST: or wordlist e.g.: follow charge genre ...
MANIFEST_APP_DESC: Psono Password Manager, store and share your passwords securely.
WEBSTORE_MAIN_DESCRIPTION:
It's used to securely create, store and share passwords with others across multiple devices. Never use a password twice again.
No password will ever leave your computer unencrypted.
An overview of Psono's security approach can be found here:
https://psono.com/security/
An overview of Psono's features can be found here:
https://psono.com/features-for-users
